journey.subtitle: A Brief History & Milestones

registration.title: Registration & Foundation
registration.description: Registered under Cooperative Act 2048 and Regulation 2049 with 33 members and an initial capital of 13,200.

early.title: Early Operations
early.description: Started with savings & loan programs, microfinance awareness, dairy business, and a fair price shop. Later added electric vehicle service.

expansion.title: First Expansion
expansion.description: Expanded operations to 17 Village Development Committees (VDCs), reaching more rural communities.

growth.title: District-wide Growth
growth.description: Operations expanded to 75 gavis in Gulmi and 4 gavis in Arghakhanchi, cementing our regional presence.

reach.title: Multi-District Reach
reach.description: Extended to six districts (Gulmi, Palpa, Arghakhanchi, Kapilbastu, Rupandehi, and Nawalparasi) with headquarters in Tamghas and multiple service centers.

journey.today: Today, we proudly serve 13,836 share members!

about.subtitle: Strengthening Communities Through Cooperation
about.founderQuote: To improve members' living standards and foster social capital through cooperation.
about.description:
The Maitri Multipurpose Cooperative Society was founded on September 12, 2000 (Bhadra 27, 2057 BS) under the leadership of the late Bom Bahadur Khadka by a group of young, business-minded locals. Our founding mission was to promote cooperative values through agricultural production, processing, and marketing, professionalize animal husbandry, create self-employment opportunities, build social capital through member unity, improve livelihoods with savings and subsidized loans, and advance the local cooperative movement.

The cooperative was officially registered on October 17, 2001 (Kartik 1, 2058 BS), with 33 founding members and NPR 13,200 in share capital. Initially, our service area covered five VDCs: Tamghas, Arkhale Simichaur, Nayagaun, and Jaisithok. Since inception, we have successfully operated comprehensive savings and loan programs, published the 'Laghuvitta Maitri Sandesh' newsletter, managed a dairy business and fair-price shop, and now even support an electric vehicle operation.

Our growth has been remarkable and consistent. In 2007, our working area expanded to 17 VDCs, then to 75 VDCs of Gulmi and 4 of Arghakhanchi in 2015. Finally, in 2020, our scope expanded to cover all six districts of the former Lumbini Zone: Gulmi, Palpa, Arghakhanchi, Kapilbastu, Rupandehi, and Nawalparasi. Today, we operate with our Head Office in Tamghas and service centers in seven other strategic locations, proudly serving 13,836 share members.
about.vision: Our cooperative is guided by the vision of improving our members' living standards and fostering social capital within our community.

howToJoin.title: How to Join

steps: Complete membership application form at our office
Pay the membership fee of Rs. 1,000
Purchase minimum one share (Rs. 100 per share)
Provide citizenship certificate or valid ID

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find quick answers to common questions

membership.question: What are the requirements to become a member?
membership.answer: To become a member, you need to be a resident of our service area, provide citizenship or identity proof, fill out the membership form, and purchase at least one share (value determined by current share price).

loans.question: How can I apply for a loan?
loans.answer: Loans are available to members who have maintained an active savings account for at least 3 months. Visit any of our branches with your membership card to fill out a loan application form.

hours.question: What are the cooperative's working hours?
hours.answer: Our branches are open Sunday through Friday from 10:00 AM to 5:00 PM. We are closed on Saturdays and national holidays. Mobile banking services are available 24/7.

mobile.question: How do I access mobile banking services?
mobile.answer: You need to register for mobile banking at any of our branches by bringing your membership card and valid ID. After registration, you can download our app and log in with the provided credentials.
